nodes.text: Jinn Reeso's Podracer featured a distinctive black and white paint scheme and a pair of exceptionally large engines. It was often the favorite whenever it was entered at the Mon Gazza Spice Mine Run race.
This Pod was only selectable for play if the player entered the code RRJINNRE or RRTANGENTABACUS for the N64 version of Star Wars Episode I: Racer. Upon entry, Jinn fully replaces Mars Guo.
